message:
Vice Adm. William McRaven, the leader of the military's elite terrorist hunting unit, will be the next leader of all U.S. Special Operations Forces.

"He even praised McRaven’s 'diplomatic skills'—most visibly on display in Afghanistan, after McRaven presented a Gardez village with 2 sheep to atone for a botched raid that left civilians dead."

http://www.wired.com/dangerroom/2011/03/its-his-special-operations-world-you-just-get-hunted-in-it/
